akn:section.akn:heading: Grounds for termination of parent and child relationship.

akn:content.akn:p: A judge may enter an order for the termination of the parent and child relationship when the judge finds from the evidence presented, after giving due consideration to the interests of all parties, that the termination is in the best interests of the child.
